VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.label: floors
VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.description: Floors that are used for purely decorative purposes.

VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.label: walls
VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.description: Walls that are used mostly for decorative purposes.

VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.label: borders
VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.description: Ground borders to properly demarcate your pathways.

VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.label: decals
VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.description: Decal props that are set on the ground with different informational data.

VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.label: big decals
VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.description: Large decal props that are set on the ground with different informational data.

VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.label: medieval
VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.description: Medieval props fit for a grand castle or a simple peasant village.

VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.label: farm
VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.description: Farm props such as hay and wood piles, wooden carts, etc.

VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.label: furniture
VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.description: Furniture that has no gameplay mechanic behind it, such as decorative armoires, mirrors, etc.

VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.label: office
VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.description: Office and research lab props.

VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.label: industrial
VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.description: Industrial props such as barrels, pallets, boxes and containers.

VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.label: kitchen
VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.description: Kitchen props such as cooking appliances, kitchen furniture, etc.

VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.label: power
VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.description: Props related to power structures, generators, gas tanks, etc.

VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.label: spacer
VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.description: High-tech props related to the spacer tech level.

VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.label: vehicles
VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.description: Vehicles props. Trucks, cars, lorries, etc.

VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.label: spaceships
VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.description: Spaceship props. All kinds of vehicles designed for space travel.

VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.label: plants
VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.description: Base game plants as props.

VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.label: parks
VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.description: General outdoors props in a nature setting.

VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.label: workshop
VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.description: Production and workshop props that fit in a crafting environment.

VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.label: filth
VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.description: Base game filth as props. Cradle not included.

VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.label: ancient
VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.description: Ancient props that are usually scattered around the map. Note these will not work for the Scrapper meme in VE: Memes and Structures, as they are purely decorative.

VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.label: vaults
VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.description: Props found in ancient vaults.

VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.label: imperial
VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.description: Props from the Empire.

VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.label: labs
VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.description: Props found in ancient abandoned labs.

VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.label: bedroom
VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.description: Bedroom props.

VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.label: effects
VFEProps.PropCategoryDef.description: Invisible props that release particles from effecters. Bear in mind these will be laggy, so use in moderation.
